trans-unit.source: Base Setup

seg-source.mrk: Base Setup

trans-unit.source: This topic describes setup pages located within the Base setup and Other Setup menu groups in the cc|project, Administration menu.

seg-source.mrk: This topic describes setup pages located within the Base setup and Other Setup menu groups in the cc|project, Administration menu.

trans-unit.source: Job Posting Groups

seg-source.mrk: Job Posting Groups

trans-unit.source: Job Posting Groups are used to direct postings for Work in Progress (WIP) job activities to accounts within the General Ledger. The default Job Posting Group is set up when the initial setup is run (using the Job Setup Checklist); however, the accounts need to be specified.

seg-source.mrk: Job Posting Groups are used to direct postings for Work in Progress (WIP) job activities to accounts within the General Ledger.
The default Job Posting Group is set up when the initial setup is run (using the Job Setup Checklist); however, the accounts need to be specified.

trans-unit.source: : Job Posting Groups page

seg-source.mrk: : Job Posting Groups page

trans-unit.source: The fields on this page that are relevant for cc|project are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this page that are relevant for cc|project are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Code

seg-source.mrk: Code

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier for the posting group.

seg-source.mrk: Unique identifier for the posting group.

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Short description of the posting group.

seg-source.mrk: Short description of the posting group.

trans-unit.source: Default WIP Method

seg-source.mrk: Default WIP Method

trans-unit.source: WIP Method that will be defaulted to the Job Card for this posting group. The options are Cost Value, Sales Value, Cost of Sales, Percentage of Completion and Completed Contract.

seg-source.mrk: WIP Method that will be defaulted to the Job Card for this posting group.
The options are Cost Value, Sales Value, Cost of Sales, Percentage of Completion and Completed Contract.

trans-unit.source: WIP Value

seg-source.mrk: WIP Value

trans-unit.source: Asset account, used to capture the calculated job value, i.e., for expenses that can be processed at a later time.

seg-source.mrk: Asset account, used to capture the calculated job value, i.e., for expenses that can be processed at a later time.

trans-unit.source: WIP Prospective Cost

seg-source.mrk: WIP Prospective Cost

trans-unit.source: Liabilities account, used to capture the expected future cost, i.e., for expenses that are released but will be processed at a later time.

seg-source.mrk: Liabilities account, used to capture the expected future cost, i.e., for expenses that are released but will be processed at a later time.

trans-unit.source: WIP Impending Losses

seg-source.mrk: WIP Impending Losses

trans-unit.source: Accrual account, used to capture exceeded estimated costs.

seg-source.mrk: Accrual account, used to capture exceeded estimated costs.

trans-unit.source: WIP Cost of Sales

seg-source.mrk: WIP Cost of Sales

trans-unit.source: Revenue account, used to capture summarized costs.

seg-source.mrk: Revenue account, used to capture summarized costs.

trans-unit.source: WIP IS Adjustment

seg-source.mrk: WIP IS Adjustment

trans-unit.source: General Ledger account (Income Statement), used for periodic accrual adjustments.

seg-source.mrk: General Ledger account (Income Statement), used for periodic accrual adjustments.

trans-unit.source: WIP IS Impending Losses

seg-source.mrk: WIP IS Impending Losses

trans-unit.source: General Ledger account (Income Statement), used for periodic accrual adjustments of impending losses.

seg-source.mrk: General Ledger account (Income Statement), used for periodic accrual adjustments of impending losses.

trans-unit.source: WIP IS Prospective Cost

seg-source.mrk: WIP IS Prospective Cost

trans-unit.source: General Ledger account (Income Statement), used for periodic accrual adjustments of prospective costs.

seg-source.mrk: General Ledger account (Income Statement), used for periodic accrual adjustments of prospective costs.

trans-unit.source: WIP IS Cost of Sales

seg-source.mrk: WIP IS Cost of Sales

trans-unit.source: General Ledger account (Income Statement), used for periodic revenue adjustments.

seg-source.mrk: General Ledger account (Income Statement), used for periodic revenue adjustments.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: Additional set up can be performed at any time, but will only apply to future job activities; they cannot be made retroactively.

seg-source.mrk: Additional set up can be performed at any time, but will only apply to future job activities; they cannot be made retroactively.

trans-unit.source: Job Journal Templates

seg-source.mrk: Job Journal Templates

trans-unit.source: The Job Journal Templates are used to set up special information that can be used in the journal lines. There are two different kinds of Job Journal templates for the use of cc|project:

seg-source.mrk: The Job Journal Templates are used to set up special information that can be used in the journal lines.
There are two different kinds of Job Journal templates for the use of cc|project:

trans-unit.source: Job Types

seg-source.mrk: Job Types

trans-unit.source: Job Types are used to create logical classifications among jobs. Each Job Type can have a specific number series, default dimension and posting group attached.

seg-source.mrk: Job Types are used to create logical classifications among jobs.
Each Job Type can have a specific number series, default dimension and posting group attached.

trans-unit.source: : Job Types Setup page

seg-source.mrk: : Job Types Setup page

trans-unit.source: The fields on this page are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this page are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Code

seg-source.mrk: Code

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier for the job type.

seg-source.mrk: Unique identifier for the job type.

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Short description of the job type.

seg-source.mrk: Short description of the job type.

trans-unit.source: Default Status

seg-source.mrk: Default Status

trans-unit.source: Indicates the status that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the status that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

trans-unit.source: Job Nos.

seg-source.mrk: Job Nos.

trans-unit.source: Number series to be used for this Job Type.

seg-source.mrk: Number series to be used for this Job Type.

trans-unit.source: Default Sales Code

seg-source.mrk: Default Sales Code

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Sales Code that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Sales Code that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

trans-unit.source: Default Job Posting Group

seg-source.mrk: Default Job Posting Group

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Job Posting Group that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Job Posting Group that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

trans-unit.source: Default Dimension Value

seg-source.mrk: Default Dimension Value

trans-unit.source: Indicates the job type dimension value that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the job type dimension value that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

trans-unit.source: Default Unit Price Base

seg-source.mrk: Default Unit Price Base

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Unit Price Base that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the Unit Price Base that will be defaulted to the Job Card each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

trans-unit.source: Default QC Template

seg-source.mrk: Default QC Template

trans-unit.source: Indicates the QC Test List for the Job that will be created each time a Job is created with this Job Type. Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Quality Checklists.htm#_Ref437504155" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Quality Checklists” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the QC Test List for the Job that will be created each time a Job is created with this Job Type.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="Quality Checklists.htm#_Ref437504155" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Quality Checklists” on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information.

trans-unit.source: List Sorting

seg-source.mrk: List Sorting

trans-unit.source: Enables a logical sorting of Job Types but overrides alphabetical sorting, e.g., entering a 1 means that it will appear first in the list.

seg-source.mrk: Enables a logical sorting of Job Types but overrides alphabetical sorting, e.g., entering a 1 means that it will appear first in the list.

trans-unit.source: Job Type when Order

seg-source.mrk: Job Type when Order

trans-unit.source: Job Type to be changed to on the Job Card when a job is converted from a quote into an order.

seg-source.mrk: Job Type to be changed to on the Job Card when a job is converted from a quote into an order.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: The Job Type Setup page can be opened directly from the Job Types page (cc|project > Jobs > Job Types > Actions > Setup).

seg-source.mrk: The Job Type Setup page can be opened directly from the Job Types page (cc|project > Jobs > Job Types > Actions > Setup).

trans-unit.source: Sales Codes

seg-source.mrk: Sales Codes

trans-unit.source: Sales Codes are used to manage all sales processes. Sales documents can only be created if a link to a Sales Code exists. This link can be formed from a Sales Code in the line or in a linked upper structure.

seg-source.mrk: Sales Codes are used to manage all sales processes.
Sales documents can only be created if a link to a Sales Code exists.
This link can be formed from a Sales Code in the line or in a linked upper structure.

trans-unit.source: : Job Sales Code page

seg-source.mrk: : Job Sales Code page

trans-unit.source: Some of the fields on the Job Sales Codes page are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: Some of the fields on the Job Sales Codes page are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Sales Channel

seg-source.mrk: Sales Channel

trans-unit.source: Identifies the sales channel. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Identifies the sales channel.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Fixed Price – Invoicing is independent from usage.

seg-source.mrk: Fixed Price – Invoicing is independent from usage.

trans-unit.source: Usage – Invoicing is directly based on usage entries.

seg-source.mrk: Usage – Invoicing is directly based on usage entries.

trans-unit.source: Realized % – Usage entries are the basis for the calculation of Realized %. Invoicing is indirectly based on Realized % of Cost usage, Quantity usage, or manual entry of Realized %.

seg-source.mrk: Realized % – Usage entries are the basis for the calculation of Realized %.
Invoicing is indirectly based on Realized % of Cost usage, Quantity usage, or manual entry of Realized %.

trans-unit.source: Performance – Currently has no functionality.

seg-source.mrk: Performance – Currently has no functionality.

trans-unit.source: Chargeable

seg-source.mrk: Chargeable

trans-unit.source: If not selected on a sales position, there will be no calculation on “Sales Line Amount”.

seg-source.mrk: If not selected on a sales position, there will be no calculation on “Sales Line Amount”.

trans-unit.source: Invoicing Trigger

seg-source.mrk: Invoicing Trigger

trans-unit.source: Determines what prompts the invoicing process. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines what prompts the invoicing process.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Planning Invoicing – Used at the end of the invoicing period. All transactions for this period are already posted. Use the “Planning and Processing” view or “Sale” view and then click Navigate > Invoicing (in the Processing group) > Planning to start the functionality.

seg-source.mrk: Planning Invoicing – Used at the end of the invoicing period.
All transactions for this period are already posted.
Use the “Planning and Processing” view or “Sale” view and then click Navigate > Invoicing (in the Processing group) > Planning to start the functionality.

trans-unit.source: Enter in Job Journal Line – Collects the data directly while posting through the Time Journals. The respective sales amount is shown in Invoicing Total Price (Proc.) field.

seg-source.mrk: Enter in Job Journal Line – Collects the data directly while posting through the Time Journals.
The respective sales amount is shown in Invoicing Total Price (Proc.) field.

trans-unit.source: Posting Process – Collects the invoicing data based on the posted usage records. Postings with a limited quantity are allocated by posting sequence to invoice run.

seg-source.mrk: Posting Process – Collects the invoicing data based on the posted usage records.
Postings with a limited quantity are allocated by posting sequence to invoice run.

trans-unit.source: Sales Price Source

seg-source.mrk: Sales Price Source

trans-unit.source: Defines which sales price should be used for invoicing. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Defines which sales price should be used for invoicing.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Job Line – Unit prices are taken from the sales job position.

seg-source.mrk: Job Line – Unit prices are taken from the sales job position.

trans-unit.source: Standard Prices – Unit prices are taken from the standard price findings.

seg-source.mrk: Standard Prices – Unit prices are taken from the standard price findings.

trans-unit.source: Cost Plus – Unit prices are taken from posted costs + surcharge from the sales job position.

seg-source.mrk: Cost Plus – Unit prices are taken from posted costs + surcharge from the sales job position.

trans-unit.source: Limited Quantity

seg-source.mrk: Limited Quantity

trans-unit.source: Distinguishes chargeable parts from non-chargeable parts. In this case, the limited quantity restriction relates to an outstanding posting or a directly linked sales position (of a higher level structure).

seg-source.mrk: Distinguishes chargeable parts from non-chargeable parts.
In this case, the limited quantity restriction relates to an outstanding posting or a directly linked sales position (of a higher level structure).

trans-unit.source: Check Milestones

seg-source.mrk: Check Milestones

trans-unit.source: If selected, the sales process is triggered through milestone status.

seg-source.mrk: If selected, the sales process is triggered through milestone status.

trans-unit.source: Job Signals

seg-source.mrk: Job Signals

trans-unit.source: In the Job Signals page – located within the Other Setup menu group on the cc|project, Administration menu – define the colors that will be used in the various views.

seg-source.mrk: In the Job Signals page – located within the Other Setup menu group on the cc|project, Administration menu – define the colors that will be used in the various views.

trans-unit.source: After a Job Signal is defined with a unique code and a short description, assign an image file by right-clicking the Picture field and then clicking Select Picture.

seg-source.mrk: After a Job Signal is defined with a unique code and a short description, assign an image file by right-clicking the Picture field and then clicking Select Picture.

trans-unit.source: : Selecting a picture in the Job Signals page

seg-source.mrk: : Selecting a picture in the Job Signals page

trans-unit.source: Locate and select the picture file to import and then click Open. The image file appears in the Picture field.

seg-source.mrk: Locate and select the picture file to import and then click Open.
The image file appears in the Picture field.

trans-unit.source: : Job Signals list page

seg-source.mrk: : Job Signals list page

trans-unit.source: Click Edit or View to open the corresponding Job Signal Card, where the same process to add job signals can be performed. The Job Signal Card is also used to provide WebClient compatibility for uploading signal pictures.

seg-source.mrk: Click Edit or View to open the corresponding Job Signal Card, where the same process to add job signals can be performed.
The Job Signal Card is also used to provide WebClient compatibility for uploading signal pictures.

trans-unit.source: : Job Signal Card

seg-source.mrk: : Job Signal Card
